title: @riot I have a serious question about Bard!
body:
Does bard have an actual body underneath his clothing? Or is he just air and glitter?
This is important because apparently it's weird to find a "balloon" attractive
i mean... asking for a friend. of course

replies.body: He is magical energy that takes a physical form in order to interact with dimensions.... so, no. You see the magical sparks that leave his "body" when he dies? that IS Bard. That "Body" that you see its only like a puppet created by him.
ED speaketh the truth! Bard takes whatever's nearby to manifest physically when he enters a new dimension.
So Bard would look very different upon traveling to somewhere like the Void?

Yes, but he would most likely avoid it.

Y'know.
